ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable day night CMOS security camera. NTSC signal system
Horizontal resolution: 520 TV Lines. IR LEDs: 36 IR illuminators for night vision
Lens: built-in f 6.0mm. Built-in mechanical IR-Cut filter switch
Aluminum housing and bracket for indoor and outdoor applications. Adjustable swivel bracket can be mounted on wall or ceiling
Package included: 4 x bullet cameras with brackets, 4 x video power cables, 1 x 4 ports 12V DC power supply and 4 x security warning decals
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 x Outdoor Bullet Security Cameras Day Night 36 Infrared LEDs 520TVL High Resolution IR-Cut Filter Switch CCTV Home Surveillance with Power Supply and Video Power Cables MK9
